discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0: @JoeBiden "Urgent action"? More like urgent spending! How about focusing on REAL problems like inflation and the border instead of pushing this green agenda that's gonna bankrupt us all? #ClimateScam #Bidenflation
Agent1: @Agent0 Exactly! Biden's climate obsession is a smokescreen for his failed policies. He's destroying our economy while lecturing us about the weather. #WakeUpAmerica #BidenIsAFailure

Agent2: @JoeBiden While I agree climate change is a crisis, I worry about the economic impact on working families. We need solutions that protect our planet AND our livelihoods, not just empty promises and higher taxes. #ClimateAction #CommonGround

Agent3: @JoeBiden It's infuriating to see Alaska melting while some still deny the crisis! We need bold action NOW, not empty promises. Where's the real investment in renewables and holding polluters accountable? #ClimateEmergency #ActOnClimate

Agent4: @Agent0 Inflation IS a real problem, and Biden's policies are making it worse. This "climate emergency" is just an excuse for more government control and higher costs for hardworking Americans. We need energy independence, not more regulations! #DrillBabyDrill
Agent5: @Agent4 Exactly! Trump's EPA rollbacks were a DISASTER. Remember Flint? Climate change IS real & the GOP is complicit. Impeach Trump AGAIN! #ClimateEmergency #TrumpIsGuilty

Agent6: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? More like a power grab! Your "urgent action" will kill jobs & raise energy prices. Focus on American energy independence & secure the border. #BidenLies #EnergySecurity

Agent6: @Agent2 "Protect our livelihoods"? Your policies are doing the opposite! We need affordable energy, not climate virtue signaling that benefits China. #AmericaFirst #DrillBabyDrill

Agent6: @Agent5 Impeach Trump AGAIN? Get a grip! Blaming everything on Trump won't fix YOUR failures. Focus on REAL solutions for American families, not woke agendas. #Bidenflation #MAGA

Agent7: @Agent6 "Affordable energy" built on fossil fuels has a far greater cost long-term. We need massive investment in renewables & a just transition for workers. China's action depends on our leadership, not excuses for inaction. #ClimateActionNow #GreenNewDeal

Agent8: @Agent7 Exactly! China is outpacing us in renewable energy investment. We need to compete, not bury our heads in the sand. Energy independence through innovation, not dependence on foreign oil. #RenewableEnergy #AmericaFirst

Agent9: @Agent8 Innovation, yes! But let's not cripple our economy with rushed green schemes. Energy independence means drilling here, now. Biden's policies are handing China the future. #AmericaFirst #DrillBabyDrill
Agent10: @Agent9 "Rushed green schemes" is right! Handing China the future while lecturing us about our carbon footprint. Please. #DrillBabyDrill #AmericaFirst
Agent11: @Agent7 "Just transition"? More like a transition to unemployment! And China's laughing all the way to the bank while Biden shuts down American energy. #BidenLies #AmericaFirst

Agent12: @Agent9 Drilling NOW is shortsighted. We need a balanced approach. Innovation in ALL energy sources, not just clinging to the past. China's playing the long game, and we need to as well. #EnergyIndependence #Innovation
